Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Yasser Arafat 
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Yasser Arafat, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 11th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 The floral basket was conveyed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah on April 8.

Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps 
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 11th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is doyen of the corps on April 8.

articles.title: Staff Members of Syrian Embassy Visit Revolutionary Site on Mt. Jang
articles.content:
Staff Members of Syrian Embassy Visit Revolutionary Site on Mt. Jang 
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Charge d'affaires a. i. Muhammad Adib Alhani and staff members of the Syrian embassy here visited the Revolutionary Site on Mt. Jang on April 8 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the foundation of the Arab Socialist Baath Party.
 They went round with keen interest historic buildings and mementoes, being briefed on the fact that during the revolutionary activities at Kim Il Sung University leader Kim Jong Il participated in the project for expanding the road between Wasan-dong and Ryongsong and wisely led students and servicepersons, true to President Kim Il Sung's far-sighted plan for building the capital city and that he mastered the Juche-oriented military theory and tactics.    
 The charge d'affaires a. i. made an entry in the visitor's book.

Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Cultural Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Cultural Delegation
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and conversed with a Chinese cultural delegation led by Zhao Weisui, vice-minister of Culture, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Kim Jong Ho, chairman of the organizing committee of the 22nd April Spring Friendship Art Festival, and Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Indonesian Government Cultural Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Indonesian Government Cultural Delegation Arrives
    Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian government cultural delegation led by Thamrin B. Bachri, vice-minister of Culture and Tourism, arrived here today to participate in the 22nd April Spring Friendship Art Festival and the 6th Kimilsungia Festival.
 Among the arrivals today were a Mongolian cultural delegation and a Cambodian cultural delegate.    
 They were greeted at the airport by Jo Yong Hwa, vice-chairman of the organizing committee of the art festival, Janchivdorjyn Lomvo, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK, Keo Sophannara, charge d'affaires a.i. of the Cambodian embassy here, and Barita Siburian, first secretary of the Indonesian embassy.
